segments.text: Hello , Sir . Can I help you with anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would like to use the ATM to make a payment . But I need to pay 3 parties at once .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem at all . With this service , you can pay up to 10 parties at one time . Are these parties on your current beneficiaries list ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are , yes . How should I do this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Select ' pay multiple beneficiaries ' , here ... then select ' pay from the account ' in the drop down menu ... OK , good . Then we need to enter the beneficiary statement reference .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And your statement reference and the payment amount . Click on next , then ' pay beneficiaries ' . That's it ! All done .
segments.speaker: S1
